title: Development Process for Mobile-Based Language Training Transfer Assessment Models

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic digital literacy and job-related language skills
context.additional_context: Need to establish an evaluation system for mobile learning model implementation in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments and transfer training outcomes to real-world work settings

learning_goals: Utilize core mobile learning tool features (mobility, accessibility, interactivity) with over 80% accuracy
Propose three or more concrete strategies for applying learning content to job-related situations
Based on the training transfer evaluation model, one can accurately diagnose their learning outcomes with over 70% accuracy

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
